messages.message:
Brian
Yeah I hope you are having fun also.  At least you don't have to tell us to be quiet next semester!  We will have to hang out sometime, I'm getting pretty good at pool.  Next semester I am going even further, I want to install X10 Dimmer switches in my room so i can control lighting with my computer or the touch of a button.
